definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The school had been opened only last year by the agent to the governor-general .
sentences.chinese: 這所學校是去年由英屬領地總督的代理人主持開幕的。

sentences.english: The deputy of these travelers was despatched to take the news to the travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 這些旅遊者的代理人被派遣去送口信給旅行社。

sentences.english: Tomorrow your agent will apologize for not calling.
sentences.chinese: 明天你的代理人會爲沒有打電話來而道歉。

sentences.english: PK Soh is definitely the best real estate advisor I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 蘇培鈞先生無疑是我所遇到的最好的房地產代理人。

sentences.english: However, law agents' consulting of case materials may not affect the hearing of cases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，訴訟代理人查閱案件材料不得影響案件的審理。

sentences.english: We should be interested in acting as your sole agent.
sentences.chinese: 我們很苦願問應做貴公司的獨家代庖代理人。

sentences.english: The tickets will be on sale from somewhere else because the agencies have bought them up.
sentences.chinese: 票將在別的地方出售，因爲在這裏代理人把它買空了。

sentences.english: You are the agents of change and the tellers of truth.
sentences.chinese: 你是變革的代理人和真理的計票員。

sentences.english: is an agent in Los Angeles for a voice casting agency.
sentences.chinese: 她是洛杉磯一家配音公司的代理人。

sentences.english: The company is required to post a bond with the abta.
sentences.chinese: 該公司被要求向英國旅遊代理人協會交保證金。

sentences.english: Then the customs declaration may be made by consignees or their agents.
sentences.chinese: 收貨人或其代理人可辦理貨物報關手續。

sentences.english: We are willing to be your agent in Thailand for hand-tools.
sentences.chinese: 我們願意在泰國做你方的手工工具代理人。

sentences.english: The futures company concerned shall check and verify the real identity of the agent by crosscheck .
sentences.chinese: 期貨公司應當對照覈實代理人的真實身份。

sentences.english: They become the agents of your karma.
sentences.chinese: 他們成了你的卡爾瑪的代理人。

sentences.english: The adjudicating personnel shall not accept a treat or gift from the parties or their agents.
sentences.chinese: 審判人員不得接受當事人及其訴訟代理人請客送禮。

sentences.english: I have been instructed by my agent that you still owe me ￡50.
sentences.chinese: 我的代理人通知我你尚欠我五十英鎊。

definition: to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position/to act as an agent or proxy/surrogate/(computing) proxy
legal person/corporation/see also 自然人[zi4 ran2 ren2]
